column1: Little Goat Diner////The second time I wanted something small
column2: so just had some cheesey grits and a biscuit. I had seen someone get the grist the first time around and just had to go back for them. They were very fluffy and defintely cheesy. The biscuit was square
column4: but it was more like a pastry than a biscuit. I still enjoyed it though.
